events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: Analysis of the global value chain for urban light electric vehicle batteries in South Korea and Japan, highlighting core competencies, cost reduction, and product differentiation.
events.description: Analysis of the global value chain for urban light electric vehicle batteries in South Korea and Japan, highlighting core competencies, cost reduction, and product differentiation.

events.name: Battery production
events.wd_description: Companies in South Korea and Japan involved in the production and sales of batteries, with data collected from interviews and document analysis.
events.description: Companies in South Korea and Japan involved in the production and sales of batteries, with data collected from interviews and document analysis.

events.name: Global integration
events.wd_description: Prospects of integrating the value chain globally, with potential participants like Brazil for production components.
events.description: Prospects of integrating the value chain globally, with potential participants like Brazil for production components.

events.name: Lithium supply
events.wd_description: Ensuring lithium supply as a priority, with Brazil and Argentina being potential key players due to their resources and regional agreements.
events.description: Ensuring lithium supply as a priority, with Brazil and Argentina being potential key players due to their resources and regional agreements.

events.name: Battery power in electric vehicles
events.wd_description: The role of battery power in electric vehicles, replacing traditional fuel tanks and providing energy efficiency and extended range.
events.description: The role of battery power in electric vehicles, replacing traditional fuel tanks and providing energy efficiency and extended range.

events.name: Engine starting
events.wd_description: Utilization of battery power for starting the engine and other functions in internal combustion vehicles.
events.description: Utilization of battery power for starting the engine and other functions in internal combustion vehicles.

events.name: Power supply
events.wd_description: Battery power supplying energy to the electric engine, replacing the fuel tank.
events.description: Battery power supplying energy to the electric engine, replacing the fuel tank.

events.name: Energy efficiency
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion battery providing up to 150 km range, with high energy efficiency and 2000 recharge cycles.
events.description: Lithium-ion battery providing up to 150 km range, with high energy efficiency and 2000 recharge cycles.

events.name: Lithium battery market dynamics
events.wd_description: Factors affecting the price and market dynamics of lithium batteries, including supply shortages, political issues, and technological advancements.
events.description: Factors affecting the price and market dynamics of lithium batteries, including supply shortages, political issues, and technological advancements.

events.name: Price increase
events.wd_description: Shortage in global supply of lithium and rare earth materials, and political problems in high production countries.
events.description: Shortage in global supply of lithium and rare earth materials, and political problems in high production countries.

events.name: Price decrease
events.wd_description: Improvements in battery technology and large-scale production increasing supply.
events.description: Improvements in battery technology and large-scale production increasing supply.

events.name: Global integration prospects
events.description: The global value chain has prospects for integration, with components potentially being produced outside Asian countries, including Brazil.

events.name: Lithium mining in Brazil
events.description: Lithium mining in Brazil could be a path for the country to become part of the battery global value chain, leveraging technology and experience from the Vale Company and lithium reserves in neighboring South American countries.

events.name: Strategic technology development
events.description: Public policy should focus on mapping components of the battery global value chain and identifying strategic areas for production in Brazil.

events.name: Battery weight and cost impact
events.description: Batteries account for about 40% of an electric vehicle's weight and 50% of its final price, impacting the vehicle's total cost of ownership and performance.

events.name: Recyclability
events.description: Lithium batteries are fully recyclable, which contributes to sustainability and economic value.

events.name: Growth potential of rechargeable batteries
events.description: Rechargeable batteries have the largest growth potential for lithium compounds, despite lithium being a limited resource concentrated in a few countries.
